name: CreateWorkItem
description: Creates a new work item from a build or release.
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: teamProject
inputs.label: Team Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the team project in which to create the new work item or leave empty to use the current project. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#teamProject)

inputs.name: workItemType
inputs.label: Work Item Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the work item type to create. To select one from the available types, click the button. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#workItemType)

inputs.name: title
inputs.label: Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a value for the work item title field. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#title)

inputs.name: assignedTo
inputs.label: Assigned To
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter an identity to assign the new work item to. The identity must be in the form **"{display name} <{login email}>"** (e.g., John Doe <johnd@contoso.com>) or the identity ID (e.g., $(Build.RequestedForId). [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#assignedTo)

inputs.name: areaPath
inputs.label: Area Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the area path for the work item. If you are unsure about the value, click the button and select an existing area path. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#areaPath)

inputs.name: iterationPath
inputs.label: Iteration Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the iteration path for the work item. If you are unsure about the value, click the button and select an existing iteration path. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#iterationPath)

inputs.name: fieldMappings
inputs.label: Additional Fields
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter field-value mappings (one per line) in the format **<field name>=<field value>** (without angle brackets) to set additional work item fields. Click the button to easily select fields and enter values. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#fieldMappings)

inputs.name: associate
inputs.label: Associate Work Item With Current Build or Release
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable this option to associate the newly created work item with the current build or release environment. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#associate)

inputs.name: associationType
inputs.label: Association Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the association type that should be used when linking work items to the current build or release. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#associationType)

inputs.name: linkWorkItems
inputs.label: Link Work Items
inputs.helpMarkDown: Activate to link the new work item to an existing one. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#linkWorkItems)

inputs.name: linkType
inputs.label: Link Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the link type that should be used for linking other work items. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#linkType)

inputs.name: linkTarget
inputs.label: Link Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select **ID** to link to a work item with a specific ID, **Query** to link to all work items matching a work item query, or **Associated Work Items** to link to the work items associated with the current build or release. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#linkTarget)

inputs.name: targetId
inputs.label: Target ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the ID of the work item to which the new item should be linked. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#targetId)

inputs.name: targetWiql
inputs.label: Target Query
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a work item query (WIQL syntax) so select the work items to which the new item should be linked. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#targetWiql)

inputs.name: limitWorkItemLinksToSameProject
inputs.label: Prevent Links to Other Projects
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option to prevent creating links to work items in a different project than the one the new work item was created in. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#limitWorkItemLinksToSameProject)

inputs.name: linkPR
inputs.label: Link to Pull Request
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this pipeline is initiated as part of a Pull Request validation and this checkbox is checked, the work item will be linked to the Pull Request. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#linkPR)

inputs.name: linkCode
inputs.label: Link to Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable this option to link the work item to specific commits or changesets. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#linkCode)

inputs.name: commitsAndChangesets
inputs.label: Commit and Changesets
inputs.helpMarkDown: List the commits and/or changesets to link to (one per line). Use the format *<project name or ID>:<repository name or ID>:<commit hash>* for commits or *CS<changeset ID>* for changesets. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#commitsAndChangesets)

inputs.name: addAttachments
inputs.label: Add Attachments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option to add attachments to the new or updated work item. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#addAttachments)

inputs.name: attachmentsFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root folder in which to search for attachments. If you leave this empty, the task looks for files in the default working directory (same as if you had specified `$(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)`). [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#attachmentsFolder)

inputs.name: attachments
inputs.label: Attachments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Files to attach to the work item. Supports multiple lines of match patterns. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#attachments)

inputs.name: preventDuplicates
inputs.label: Prevent Duplicates
inputs.helpMarkDown: Activate to prevent creation of duplicate work items. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#preventDuplicates)

inputs.name: keyFields
inputs.label: Key Fields
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a list of key fields (one per line) that are used to find possible duplicates. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#keyFields)

inputs.name: updateDuplicates
inputs.label: Update Duplicate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Activate to update a possible duplicate work item. **Note:** If multiple duplicate work items are found, the task only updates the one that was last created (i.e., the item with the highest ID). [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#updateDuplicates)

inputs.name: updateRules
inputs.label: Update Rules
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify one ore more field update rules (one per line). See [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#updateRules) for more information.

inputs.name: createOutputs
inputs.label: Create Output Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Activate this option to create output variables based on the newly created work item. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#createOutputs)

inputs.name: outputVariables
inputs.label: Output Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter variable-value mappings (one per line) in the format **<variable name>=<work item value>** (without angle brackets) to create a set of output variables with work item values. To get the URL of the new work item, map the value **CWI.WorkItemUrl**. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#outputVariables)

inputs.name: authToken
inputs.label: Auth Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a Personal Access Token (PAT) to use for authentication to Azure DevOps in pull request builds from forked repositories. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#authToken)

inputs.name: allowRedirectDowngrade
inputs.label: Allow Downgrade Redirects
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable this option to allow redirects to downgrade from HTTPS to HTTP. [[Docs]](https://github.com/MicrosoftPremier/VstsExtensions/blob/master/CreateWorkItem/en-US/overview.md#allowRedirectDowngrade)

outputVariables.name: LinksFiltered
outputVariables.description: Set to true if work item links have been filtered to the current project, false otherwise. Note: the variable is only generated if work item linking and the option 'Prevent Links to Other Projects' are enabled!
